dict.string: Temperature sensor is Malfunctioning.Please contact us.
Humidity sensor is Malfunctioning.Please contact us.
VOC sensor is Malfunctioning.Please contact us.
PM2.5 sensor is Malfunctioning.Please contact us.
Formaldehyde Alert(over 100ug/m3)Turn on air purifier or keep ventilated
VOC Alert.Turn on air purifier or keep ventilated
PM2.5 has reached a hazardous level. Please turn on your air purfier.
